title: The Writer's Almanac - Sunday, November 10, 2019
description: On this day in 1973, school officials in Drake, North Dakota burned copies of Kurt Vonnegut's novel “Slaughterhouse-Five.”
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: On this day in 1973, school officials in Drake, North Dakota burned copies of Kurt Vonnegut's novel “Slaughterhouse-Five.”
